NT3D_target_camera_o Class Reference

NT3D_target_camera_o class Provides an abstraction of a positionable camera which looks at a fixed target specified in camera coordinates. More...

#include <nt3d_target_camera_obj.h>

 set the camera position, i.e.

Detailed Description

The camera can be translated in space whith the view always pointing at the target coordinates.

Bug:
unknown
Warning:
Rotation of this camera has no effect
